Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:

m + S n = S n + m

Qed.```

- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
MA0.Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => (ndN m - card (MA0.Iter_rem m z))%nat : fmap -> dart -> nat
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
Module MA0 : Sig Definition f : fmap -> dart -> dart. Definition f_1 : fmap -> dart -> dart. Definition exd_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z <-> exd m (McA0.f m z). Definition exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z <-> exd m (McA0.f_1 m z). Definition bij_f : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McA0.f m). Definition bij_f_1 : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McA0.f_
pred = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A_1 m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
MA0.Iter_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i n : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MA0.f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MA0.exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := MA0.Iter_orb m z in let n := MA0.Iter_upb m z in (i <= n)%nat -> exds s (Iter (MA0.f m) i z)
MA0.mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in {j : nat | Iter (MA0.f m) i z = Iter (MA0.f m) j z /\ (j < p)%nat}
MA0.not_exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), let sr := MA0.Iter_rem m z in let n := MA0.Iter_upb m z in (i <= n)%nat -> ~ exds sr (Iter (MA0.f m) i z)
cF_L1_y_1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> (j < dx - 1)%nat -> (j + 1 + i <= dx - 1)%nat -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 = Iter (cF m) (j + 1 + i) x
diff_cF_L1_y_1_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> (j + 1 + i <= dx - 1)%nat -> (0 < i)%nat -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 <> y_1
MA0.ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem m z in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t}
MA0.ex_i_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = Iter (MA0.f m) nr z}
MA0.period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.Iter_upb m z = MA0.Iter_upb m (Iter (MA0.f m) i z)
MA0.exds_orb_ex : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := MA0.Iter_orb m z in let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in exds s t -> {i : nat | (i < p)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t}
MA0.exds_orb_eq_ex : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := MA0.Iter_orb m z in let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in exds s t < -> (exists i : nat, (i < p)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t)
MA0.between = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exists i j : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = v /\ Iter (MA0.f m) j z = t /\ (i <= j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA0.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) j z = Iter (MA0.f m) k z -> j = k
degree_L1_split_y_1_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j i : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> (j + 1 + i < dx)%nat -> expf m x y0 -> inv_hmap m1 -> MF.degree_aux m1 y_1 (dx - (j + 1 + i)) = (dx - (j + 1))%nat
MA0.Iter_plus_mult : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f m) p z = z -> Iter (MA0.f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MA0.ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t}
MA0.period_lub : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in (0 < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) nr z = z /\ (forall i : nat, (0 < i < nr)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) i z <> z)
MA0.exds_orb_eq_ex_large : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := MA0.Iter_orb m z in let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in exds s t < -> (exists i : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t)
MA0.Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MA0.f m) nr z = z
MA0.Iter_plus : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f m) (p + i) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z -> Iter (MA0.f m) p z = z
MA0.LR1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat) (s : set), let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in (ndN m - card s <= i <= n)%nat -> ~ exds sr (Iter (MA0.f m) i z)
succf = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => pred m zero z /\ pred m one (A_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> Prop
MA0.exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := MA0.Iter_upb m z in exds (MA0.Iter_orb m z) (Iter (MA0.f m) n z)
MF.Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (j <= i)%nat -> Iter (MF.f_1 m) j (Iter (MF.f m) i z) = Iter (MF.f m) (i - j) z
MA0.upb_pos : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> (0 < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat
predf = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => succ m one z /\ succ m zero (A m one z) : fmap -> dart -> Prop
fixpt_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z
MA0.rem_2_steps : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in (card sr + 2 <= card s)%nat -> exds (Ds s (Iter (MA0.f m) (ndN m - card s) z)) (Iter (MA0.f m) (ndN m + 1 - card s) z)
MA0.rem_1_step : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in (card sr + 1 <= card s)%nat < -> exds s (Iter (MA0.f m) (ndN m - card s) z)

```coq
intros m z i Hinv Hzd Hpzi Hlt.
assert (Hp: (MA0.Iter_upb m z > 0)%nat) by (apply MA0.upb_pos; auto).
assert (Hzi: Iter (MA0.f m) i z = z) by (apply MA0.Iter_period with (n:=i); auto).
assert (Hsucc: succ m zero z) by (destruct Hpzi as [j Hj]; exists j; auto).
exact Hsucc.
Qed.

original: intros m z i Hinv Hzd Hpzi Hlt. assert (Hp: (MA0.Iter_upb m z > 0)%nat) by (apply MA0.upb_pos; auto). assert (Hzi: Iter (MA0.f m) i z = z) by (apply MA0.Iter_period with (n:=i); auto). assert (Hsucc: succ m zero z) by (destruct Hpzi as [j Hj]; exists j; auto). apply Hsucc.
